keyMoments.title: Gear 3 Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts Gear 3 for the first time, biting his thumb and blowing air into his bones to create a giant fist that destroys a massive steel door at the Tower of Justice.
keyMoments.significance: This marks a critical evolution in Luffy's fighting capabilities, introducing a power-up that trades mobility for devastating strength. Gear 3 becomes one of his signature techniques.

abilities.description: Luffy bites his thumb and blows air into his bones, inflating them to giant size for massive powerful attacks.

reveals.information: Luffy has developed Gear 3, a technique that allows him to inflate his bones to giant proportions

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Fukurou
keyMoments.description: Franky engages CP9 agent Fukurou in battle while running low on cola, severely limiting his combat effectiveness.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's dependence on cola as a power source and sets up his desperate search for fuel.

keyMoments.title: The Cola Crisis and Beverage Mix-ups
keyMoments.description: Franky experiences hilarious personality changes when Chopper gives him wrong beverages - vegetable juice turns him into 'Fresh Franky' and tea makes him calm and refined.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes one of Franky's most iconic character traits - his personality and power changes based on what beverage fuels him. Becomes a recurring comedic element.
keyMoments.quote: Chopper! If you want to save Robin, throw me some cola from that fridge!

keyMoments.title: Finally Obtains Cola
keyMoments.description: After multiple failed attempts with wrong beverages, Franky finally receives actual cola from Chopper and powers up to full strength.
keyMoments.significance: Turns the tide of battle and confirms that cola is truly 'the water of life' for Franky.
keyMoments.quote: That's it! That's the real stuff! Cola is the water of life!

abilities.description: Franky shoots his razor-sharp sideburns at opponents. The weaponized sideburns are strong enough to carve stone and grow back immediately.
A weak punch attack that occurs when Franky is powered by vegetable juice instead of cola. Does no damage and demonstrates his dependence on proper fuel.

reveals.information: Franky's personality and combat effectiveness are directly tied to what beverage fuels him - cola makes him powerful and aggressive, while other drinks cause different personalities
Cola is essential for Franky's combat abilities - he calls it 'the water of life'

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Takes on Kumadori
keyMoments.description: Chopper intervenes when Kumadori confronts Nami, allowing her to continue toward Kalifa while he faces the CP9 agent himself using Arm Point.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's bravery and willingness to fight powerful opponents to protect his crewmates.
keyMoments.quote: Nami, you go on ahead! I'll handle this guy!

keyMoments.title: Traps Kumadori in Refrigerator
keyMoments.description: After his Rumble Ball wears off, Chopper cleverly tricks Kumadori into getting locked inside a refrigerator.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's quick thinking and resourcefulness even when his power-up expires.

keyMoments.title: Battles Franky
keyMoments.description: Fukurou engages Franky in combat, using his Rokushiki techniques and taking advantage of Franky's low cola reserves.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Fukurou's combat abilities and establishes him as a formidable CP9 opponent.

abilities.description: A powerful punch attack that launches at the same speed as Shigan but uses the entire fist instead of just a finger, making it faster and stronger than normal Shigan.
A rapid-fire version of Jugon where Fukurou simultaneously launches many punches at great speed, giving the impression of multiple copies of himself attacking.

reveals.information: Fukurou has mastered unique variations of Rokushiki techniques including Jugon and Fukuro Dataki

keyMoments.title: Confronts Chopper
keyMoments.description: Kumadori attempts to fight Nami but is intercepted by Chopper, who engages him in battle to protect his crewmate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Chopper vs Kumadori matchup in the Enies Lobby battles.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Kalifa
keyMoments.description: Nami reaches Kalifa's location and prepares to battle her, finding the CP9 agent preparing to take a bath.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the upcoming Nami vs Kalifa battle, one of the key female matchups in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Prepares to Battle Nami
keyMoments.description: Kalifa is found preparing for a bath when Nami arrives to confront her, setting up their upcoming battle.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kalifa as Nami's opponent in the Enies Lobby arc.
